template.name: uimain
template.value:
local gameUILayerWindow =require("game.core.gameUILayerWindow") ---@class $CLASSNAME$ local $CLASSNAME$ = class("$CLASSNAME$",gameUILayerWindow) gameUI.Init($CLASSNAME$)
function $CLASSNAME$:onDestroy() $CLASSNAME$.super.onDestroy(self) end
function $CLASSNAME$:awake() $CLASSNAME$.super.awake(self) self:bindUI(self._uiObject)
self:onRefresh() end
function $CLASSNAME$:onRefresh()
end
return $CLASSNAME$

template.name: uicell
template.value:
local gameUILayerWindow = require ("game/core/gameUILayerWindow") ---@class $CLASSNAME$ local $CLASSNAME$ = class("$CLASSNAME$",gameUILayerWindow);
function $CLASSNAME$:ctor() $CLASSNAME$.super.ctor(self) end ---@return $CLASSNAME$ function $CLASSNAME$:create() local layer = $CLASSNAME$.new() layer:init() return layer end
function $CLASSNAME$:init() self:_loadRes("uguiprefab.data","$prefabName$") self.m_nodeTransform = self.mUIObject.transform self:updateData() end
function $CLASSNAME$:updateData()
end
function $CLASSNAME$:getNodeTransform() return self.m_nodeTransform end
return $CLASSNAME$

template.name: uimainScroll
template.value:
local gameUILayerWindow =require("game.core.gameUILayerWindow") ---@class $CLASSNAME$ local $CLASSNAME$ = class("$CLASSNAME$",gameUILayerWindow) gameUI.Init($CLASSNAME$)
function $CLASSNAME$:onDestroy() for _, item in pairs(self.m_Table) do item:destroy() end self.m_Table = nil
$CLASSNAME$.super.onDestroy(self) end
function $CLASSNAME$:awake() $CLASSNAME$.super.awake(self) self:bindUI(self._uiObject)
self.m_Table = {}
self:onRefresh() end
function $CLASSNAME$:onRefresh() self.m_array = {} self.c_scorll_list.LoopVerticalScrollRect.totalCount = #self.m_array self.c_scorll_list.LoopVerticalScrollRect:RefillCells(0) end
function $CLASSNAME$:OnScrollCellIndexChange_scorll_list(transIndex,dataIndex) local data = self.m_array[dataIndex] if self.m_Table[transIndex] == nil then self.m_Table[transIndex] = uiArenaRankItem:create(data) g_bind_transform(self.m_Table[transIndex].mUIObject.transform,self["c_storage_item_node"..transIndex].transform) --self.m_Table[transIndex]:setCallback(handler(self, self._onClick)) else self.m_Table[transIndex]:updateData(data) end end
return $CLASSNAME$

template.name: Focus
template.value:
function $CLASSNAME$:onFocus() if $CLASSNAME$.super.onFocus then $CLASSNAME$.super.onFocus(self) end self:setVisible(true) end
function $CLASSNAME$:onLoseFocus() self:setVisible(false) end
